content.json:
## Juniper SRX workbook
---

This workbook is intended to visualise data for Juniper SRX monitoring

content.query:
JuniperSRX
| where TimeGenerated >= ago(30d)
| summarize count() by Facility
| render barchart
content.title: Juniper SRX Summary

content.query:
## Top 10 Users with Failed Passwords

JuniperSRX
| where EventType == \"sshd\"
| where EventName == \"Failed password\"
| summarize count() by UserName
| top 10 by count
content.title: Top 10 Users with Failed Passwords

content.query:
JuniperSRX 
| where TimeGenerated >= (30d)
| where EventType == \"RT_IDS\" 
| summarize count() by SrcIpAddr 
| top 10 by count_
content.title: Top 10 IDS Detections by Source IP Address
